targets.query: SELECT "state" FROM "dunedaq.appfwk.appinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" ='${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms), "source_id"
SELECT "error" FROM "dunedaq.appfwk.appinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' )AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("runtime") FROM "dunedaq.rcif.runinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("runno") FROM "dunedaq.rcif.runinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("td_sent_count") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" ='${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("records_written") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("td_total_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" ='${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("td_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("tokens_received")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("new_records_written")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("${hsi_field}_hsi_events_counter"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.timinglibs.${hsi_series}.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("sent_hsi_events_counter"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.timinglibs.${hsi_series}.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms) fill(null)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT severity,time,application_name,message,issue_name,host_name
FROM public."ErrorReports"
WHERE partition='${partition}' AND time >= ${__from} AND time <= ${__to}
ORDER BY -time

targets.query: SELECT sum("waiting_for_token") / (sum("waiting_for_token")+sum("processing_token")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("processing_token") / (sum("waiting_for_token")+sum("processing_token")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("forwarding_decision") / (sum("waiting_for_decision")+sum("deciding_destination") + sum("forwarding_decision"))FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("deciding_destination") / (sum("waiting_for_decision")+sum("deciding_destination") + sum("forwarding_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("waiting_for_decision") / (sum("waiting_for_decision")+sum("deciding_destination") + sum("forwarding_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(distinct("bytes_output"), 1s)  / 1048576 FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"
fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("bytes_output")), 1s)  / 1048576 FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.tpstreamwriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"
fill(null)
SELECT sum("num_chunks_processed_with_error") FROM "dunedaq.flxlibs.felixcardreaderinfo.ELinkInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("num_blocks_processed_with_error") FROM "dunedaq.flxlibs.felixcardreaderinfo.ELinkInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" WHERE $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" WHERE $timeFilter
